title: Shaded / shadow font in use for "Nomad" record sleeve
content:
Anybody know the name of this one? I've seen it many times before, but now i can't find it. It's from a new Dan Auerbach-produced record by the Tuareg guitarist/songwriter Bombino:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107013800im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font-specimen-Bombino-Nomad_4587.jpg)
author: ultramartin
